column4: oh boy, another Atheros AR928x sufferer eh... I feel ya buddy
:P You facing issues with Atheros as well?
Ah, how did you manage to fix it?
I missed what your issue was, are you just not able to connect?
I'm able to connect, but it randomly refuses to receive packets.
It's an Acer laptop running Ubuntu 10.10
disclaimer, this worked for me with a AR9285 in an Asus N53JF on 11.04, I don't know if it'll work with 10.10
Something tells me this is an issue with the hardware that manages the encryption/decryption of WPA/WEP encrypted packets?
that's one guess, I don't actually know what it does, but I found it on some web page related to this device, and it solved my issues :)
